artist: Engraver: James Peak; Delineator: After Jean-Baptiste Pillement
description: two women, a man and a child conversing in rural lane; man fishing right foreground; bridge left middle ground; donkey and 2 goats left edge; city in distance
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in black: [J. Pillement delin    J. Peak fecit 1761/ 2d Vüe de Petite Ferme/Gravé Par James Peak et dessiné par Jeanne Pillement./ London Publishd according to Act of Parliamt. 1761    De la Colection de C. Leviez]; above word Leviez in pencil(?): [2-170]; on verso upper right in pencil: [926/ 178]
title: 2d Vüe de Petite Ferme
